text: Azhagiya Asura (English: Beautiful Demon) is a 2006 Indian Tamil romantic comedy film written and directed by Nagu. The film features Yogi and Regina Cassandra, and Nanditha Jennifer in the lead roles while Krishna, Krish, Sampath Raj, and Vaiyapuri play supporting roles. Featuring music composed by Brahma, the film was released on 22 December 2006. The film's title was taken from a song from Whistle (2003). ==Cast== *Yogi as Guna *Regina Cassandra as Mahalakshmi *Nanditha Jennifer as Pavithra *Krishna as Sanjay *Krish as Guna's friend *Sampath Raj *Vaiyapuri ==Production== The film had earlier developed under the title Idiot, before the team opted for Azhagiya Asura. Yogi, grandson of veteran actor Thengai Srinivasan and Regina who earlier appeared as Laila's sister in Kanda Naal Mudhal (2005) made their debuts as lead actors with this film. ==Soundtrack== Soundtrack was composed by debutant Brahma.http://www.tamilisai.net/tamilsongs/Azhagiya_Asura_songs.asp *"Dum Dum Taka" — Malathi, Ranjith *"Pondy Bazaar" — Tippu *"Eppadi Eppadi" — Harish Raghavendra *"Uyire Ushe" — Krish *"Sutrum Bhoomi" — Ranjith ==Release== A reviewer from Indiaglitz.com noted the film was "entertaining all the way" and that "director Nagu deserves to be commended for coming up with a clean entertainer". ==References== Category:Indian films Category:2006 films Category:2000s Tamil-language films Category:Indian romantic comedy films Category:2006 directorial debut films Category:2006 romantic comedy films Category:2006 comedy films
